attributes.action: Decline the invitation from the Leader of Corby Borough Council to open the New Corby East Midlands International Swimming Pool and instead to urge Corby Council to ask an Olympic Swimming Medallist at the Beijing Olympics to open the facility instead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: This has no obvious point about Government policy.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
